Matching-channels-desc: Docking with many mainstream emerging seller platforms, sourcing platforms and logistics platforms
testimonial-text-1: This year TikTok e-commerce is very hot, our team wants to enter TikTok Southeast Asia for a long time, but has not been able to get TikTok invitation code. Our team wanted to enter TikTok Southeast Asia for a long time, but we couldn't get the invitation code for TikTok, so we entered through the GlobalTradeEZ channel, and we didn't expect that the store would be launched in 2 days.
testimonial-text-2: The TikTok cross-border store was opened in June this year, and the wind of TikTok unsourced model has been very strong, but our team are all newbies, neither sourcing nor understanding logistics shipping. globalTradeEZ's TikTok escort course has a 6-month long cycle, and the course system is very complete, covering all aspects of TikTok raising, TikTok powder, TikTok live with goods, TikTok promotion and advertising, and so on, The course covers all aspects of TikTok live with goods, TikTok promotions and advertising, which is very suitable for the growth path of new TikTok sellers, and the fastest half a month to start making profits.
testimonial-text-3: As the saying goes, seven points depend on product selection, three points depend on operation. The huge product data of Global eTrade, covering all the subdivision categories of coupang, category data updated weekly, helped me develop 5 products in 1 month. According to the geek for the hot list, historical list of detailed product analysis data, within 1 month to create explosive 3 +, selection accuracy improve 82%, to achieve orders skyrocketed 600%.
testimonial-text-4: I am doing the TikTok store group model, after using Huanqiu E-Trade ERP, the team members were streamlined by 6 people, the efficiency of laying was improved by more than 80%, and the daily orders exceeded 400 units.
